title: Permits insurers to make available multiple rating plans for private passenger motor vehicle insurance within the same company
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2705

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  SEWARD -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Insurance

       AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to permitting insurers to
         make available multiple rating plans for private passenger motor vehi-
         cle insurance within the same company

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The insurance law is amended by adding a new section 2352
    2  to read as follows:
    3    S 2352. MULTIPLE RATING PLANS.  (A)  AN  INSURER  MAY  MAKE  AVAILABLE
    4  MULTIPLE  RATING PLANS WITHIN THE SAME COMPANY FOR PERSONAL LINES INSUR-
    5  ANCE IN THE VOLUNTARY MARKET, PROVIDED THAT EACH TIME A NEW RATING  PLAN
    6  IS  DEVELOPED,  IT  SHALL APPLY ONLY TO POLICIES ISSUED ON AND AFTER THE
    7  EFFECTIVE DATE OF THE NEW PLAN.
    8    (B) FOR PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION "PERSONAL LINES INSURANCE" SHALL MEAN
    9  PROPERTY/CASUALTY INSURANCE COVERAGE SOLD TO  INDIVIDUALS  AND  FAMILIES
   10  FOR PRIMARILY NON-COMMERCIAL PURPOSES.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08794-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to permitting insurers to make available multiple rating plans for private passenger motor vehicle insurance within the same company
